bind_allocator

Associate an object of type T with an allocator of type Allocator. 

template<
    typename Allocator,
    typename T>
allocator_binder< typename decay< T >::type, Allocator > bind_allocator(
    const Allocator & s,
    T && t);
Requirements

Header: asio/bind_allocator.hpp

Convenience header: asio.hpp
